job.title: Software Quality Engineer
job.description: rgbsi is dedicated to providing the highest quality of services to our clients and employees we are proud to be the primary partner to top companies in the automotive aerospace ampamp defense it media ampamp entertainment sports energy and finance industries as a result of our clients continued growth we are looking for energetic personable professionals to partner with these leading us companiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtdescriptionltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtperform software quality assurance activities on the software development process ltligtltligtincludes review of software documentation perform audits and evaluations on software products and documentation to ensure compliance with company standards and applicable government regulationsltligtltligtin addition to the software quality engineering activities there may be a need to provide assistance to product quality engineers such as helping with hardware acceptance data packages review manufacturing and test work instructions generate reports and analyze quality data for improvementsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugteducationltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelorsltbrgtltligtltulgtwe offer attractive competitive compensation and benefits including medical dental k short term disability adampampd and tuition reimbursement etc if you take pride in your work and are committed to personal and professional success we want to talk to you please visit wwwrgbsicom to learn moreltbrgtltbrgtrgbsi is a multinational corporation headquartered in troy mi with branches throughout the usa canada germany mexico and india
